issues.description: The addGuestStudents method in the template repository has an extra parameter (boolean validateInput) compared to the problem statement and solution repository, which only specify a single integer parameter. This discrepancy could confuse students who expect to implement a method matching the problem description, potentially leading them to incorrectly modify or conflict with the existing template signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the addGuestStudents method in the template repository to have only one parameter (int numberOfNewGuestStudents) to align with the problem statement and solution, ensuring students can implement it without signature conflicts.
